rule.name: EMS_FormatStatusDisplay
rule.description: Helper rule to format the Status column of an interface using data from a process report
rule.definition: choose( ri!status + 1, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(document: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_iconIndicator"(icon: "PROGRESS_RUNNING"), altText: "Assigned", caption: "Assigned"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(document: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_iconIndicator"(icon: "PROGRESS_RUNNING"), altText: "Viewed by Assignee", caption: "Viewed by Assignee"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(document: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_iconIndicator"(icon: "STATUS_OK"), altText: "Completed", caption: "Completed"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(document: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_iconIndicator"(icon: "STATUS_NOTDONE"), altText: "Not Started", caption: "Not Started"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(document: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_iconIndicator"(icon: "STATUS_NOTDONE"), altText: "Cancelled", caption: "Cancelled"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(document: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_iconIndicator"(icon: "PROGRESS_PAUSED"), altText: "Paused", caption: "Paused"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(document: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_iconIndicator"(icon: "STATUS_WARN"), altText: "Unattended", caption: "Unattended"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(document: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_iconIndicator"(icon: "STATUS_ERROR"), altText: "Aborted", caption: "Aborted"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(document: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_iconIndicator"(icon: "STATUS_ERROR"), altText: "Cancelled By Exception", caption: "Cancelled By Exception"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(document: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_iconIndicator"(icon: "PROGRESS_RUNNING"), altText: "Submitted", caption: "Submitted"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(document: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_iconIndicator"(icon: "PROGRESS_RUNNING"), altText: "Running", caption: "Running"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(document: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_iconIndicator"(icon: "STATUS_ERROR"), altText: "Error", caption: "Error") )
